name: Podighai Infomedia
overview: Internet users are lost with search engines. Each and every internet savvy person requires its help. With this, the Online Shopping is taking off in a big way. But, if a user purchases online he loses out on offline retailers and vice-versa, to get a desired stuff at the best price available. In this regard, to avoid the hassles of a buyer, the portal www.pricemask.com came into the picture, which is operated by the newly-started chennai-based Pricemask e-Services. It is a location based price comparison portal in the country. The consumer can choose the right product and the store at the click of a mouse, and at the same time the merchants will be able to showcase their products on the portal, confirms Suresh, Managing Director, pricemask.com.
